meanings.definition: The quality of being kind and giving.
meanings.sent1: Her generousness was evident in the way she always shared her snacks with classmates.
meanings.sent2: I admire his generousness towards those in need.
meanings.sent3: The generousness of the puppy in sharing its toys with the kitten was heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: The generousness of the sun, providing warmth and light to all, is like a comforting embrace.
meanings.sent5: The generousness of the forest, offering shelter to all creatures, is a true example of kindness.

meanings.definition: The act of giving freely and without expecting anything in return.
meanings.sent1: His generousness in donating to charity every month is truly inspiring.
meanings.sent2: The generousness of the volunteers in helping rebuild the community was remarkable.
meanings.sent3: The generousness of the vending machine, giving out extra snacks by mistake, made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The generousness of the river, flowing endlessly and providing water to all, is a selfless act.
meanings.sent5: The generousness of the clouds, sharing rain with the parched land, is a beautiful display of giving.
